description:
Anveshak promotes data-driven decision making through analytics workshops, data science
                                competitions, and hands-on projects. Members learn to use tools like Python, R, Tableau,
                                and Power BI for business insights.

The club conducts workshops on statistical analysis, machine learning applications in business,
                                data visualization, and predictive modeling. Members work on real-world data analytics projects
                                and participate in hackathons and data science competitions.

Through Anveshak, students develop strong analytical capabilities, learn to extract meaningful
                                insights from data, and gain proficiency in analytics tools that are increasingly important in
                                modern business decision-making.
